_header: Euphemia that was fair of face
_description: Life of St Euphemia in the Scottish Legendary — in couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
effame þat ves fare of facea senatoure dochtir
                    ves…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…out of þis varld we may twynbut schame det & dedly
                    syne
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 2.186-9.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 2.417-23.
